title: Just got Leaverbuster'd (Houston)
body:
Just drafted a ranked match but couldn't load the game.  I looked up the same issue in this forum from a year and a half ago and it seems it's the server's fault.  
 
So how am I supposed to know that I can connect to the Houston server?  Without ruining more matches and obtaining further penalties?

replies.body:
I'm seeing a few of these Houston area problems and hoping it's not ISP related, but it's always good to check there first when so many players in the area are having problems. 

Grab [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute for me to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 so I can take a closer look. Hopefully I can pinpoint where these problems are coming from, even if it isn't ISP related.

Same thing just happened to me in the Houston area as well. Also had a similar problem a number of years ago. I think I petitioned then and got a response basically saying there wasn't anything that could be done. Have to just take the loss and hope you don't get unlucky again.
